```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gitsum)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r log_pull, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

time_log <- parse_log_detailed() %>%
  select(author_name, date, message, 
         total_insertions, total_deletions) 


time 

glimpse(time_log)
ymd(time_log$date, format = "%Y-m-d %H:%M:%S")

s_time <- time_log[1, 2] 

stop_time <- time_log[nrow(time_log)-1, 2]

stop_time - s_time
```
